#cloud-config
package_upgrade: true

packages:
  - apache2

write_files:
  - content: |
          #!/bin/bash
          echo "Test" > /tmp/test.txt
    path: /tmp/sample.sh
    permissions: 0755

runcmd:
  - [ sh, -c, "echo 'hello' > test.sh " ]
  - [ sh, -c, "/tmp/sample.sh" ]

output: {all: '| tee -a /var/log/cloud-init-output.log'}
